'''Anthony''' is a character who appears in the official manga. He was a boy who lived in [[Mondstadt]] a few years ago, until he was captured by the [[Fatui]].

==Profile==
===Appearance===
Anthony is a boy with medium-length white hair. He wore a dark brown shirt.

==Story==
Anthony worked at the bakery in Mondstadt, until he was captured by the Fatui. He is later taken to [[Haeresys]], an underground arena of the Fatui, and becomes Contender Number 139. [[Krupp]] puts Anthony, as a test subject, into battle against an unknown enemy with tentacles, where he later dies.

In the [[Dawn Winery|winery]] basement, he was mentioned by [[Diluc]] when he interrogates Krupp.
